00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include "mscb.h"

00034 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00035 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;

00037 char code node_name[] = "SCS-800";
00038 
00039 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00040 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00041 
00042 sbit SR_CLOCK = P0 ^ 4;         // Shift register clock
00043 sbit SR_STROBE = P0 ^ 5;        // Storage register clock
00044 sbit SR_DATAO = P0 ^ 2;         // Serial data out
00045 
00046 sbit NE555_RESET = P0 ^ 7;
00047 sbit NE555_TRIGGER = P0 ^ 6;
00048 
00049 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to the CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00050 
00051 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00052 
00053 struct {
00054    float cap[8];
00055    signed short ofs[8];
00056    float gain;
00057 } idata user_data;
00058 
00059 unsigned char range[8];
00060 
00061 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00062    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap0", &user_data.cap[0],
00063    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap1", &user_data.cap[1],
00064    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap2", &user_data.cap[2],
00065    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap3", &user_data.cap[3],
00066    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap4", &user_data.cap[4],
00067    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap5", &user_data.cap[5],
00068    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap6", &user_data.cap[6],
00069    4, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_NANO, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Cap7", &user_data.cap[7],
00070    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs0", &user_data.ofs[0],
00071    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs1", &user_data.ofs[1],
00072    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs2", &user_data.ofs[2],
00073    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs3", &user_data.ofs[3],
00074    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs4", &user_data.ofs[4],
00075    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs5", &user_data.ofs[5],
00076    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs6", &user_data.ofs[6],
00077    2, UNIT_FARAD, PRFX_PICO, 0, MSCBF_SIGNED, "Ofs7", &user_data.ofs[7],
00078    4, UNIT_FACTOR, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Gain", &user_data.gain,
00079    0

00082 /********************************************************************\
00083 
00084   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00085 
00086 \********************************************************************/
00087 
00088 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00089 void set_range() reentrant;
00090 
00091 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00092 
00093 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00094 {
00095    unsigned char i;
00096 
00097    PRT0CF = 0xFD;               // P0.0: TX = Push Pull  
00098    // P0.2,3,4,5,6,7: Shift Reg & NE555 = Push Pull
00099 
00100    PRT1CF = 0x00;               // P1 input
00101    P1 = 0xFF;
00102 
00103    NE555_RESET = 1;             // Remove reset
00104    NE555_TRIGGER = 1;           // Remove trigger
00105 
00106    if (init) {
00107       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00108          user_data.cap[i] = 0;
00109          user_data.ofs[i] = 0;
00110          range[i] = 0;
00111          user_data.gain = 1;
00112       }
00113    }
00114 
00115    set_range();
00116 }
00117

00119 
00120 #pragma NOAREGS
00121 
00122 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00123 {
00124    if (index);
00125 }
00126 
00127 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00128 
00129 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00130 {
00131    if (index);
00132 
00133    return 0;
00134 }
00135 
00136 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00137 
00138 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00139 {
00140    /* echo input data */
00141    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00142    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00143    return 2;
00144 }

00146 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00147 
00148 void set_range() reentrant
00149 {
00150    unsigned char i;
00151 
00152    SR_STROBE = 0;
00153    SR_CLOCK = 0;
00154 
00155    /* first shift register (chn 0-3) */
00156    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00157       /* first bit (5M1 Ohm) */
00158       SR_DATAO = 1;
00159       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00160       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00161 
00162       /* second bit (5k6 Ohm) */
00163       SR_DATAO = 1;
00164       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00165       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00166    }
00167 
00168    /* second shift register (chn 0-3) */
00169    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00170       /* first bit (5M1 Ohm) */
00171       SR_DATAO = 1;
00172       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00173       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00174 
00175       /* second bit (5k6 Ohm) */
00176       SR_DATAO = 1;
00177       SR_CLOCK = 1;
00178       SR_CLOCK = 0;
00179    }
00180 
00181    /* strobe output */
00182    SR_DATAO = 0;
00183    SR_STROBE = 1;
00184    SR_STROBE = 0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00188 
00189 void cap_read()
00190 {
00191    static unsigned char channel = 0;
00192    unsigned char m, i;
00193    unsigned long v;
00194    float c;
00195 
00196    /* average 10 times */
00197    for (i = v = 0; i < 10; i++) {
00198       yield();
00199 
00200       m = (1 << channel);
00201 
00202       /* init timer 3 */
00203       TMR3L = 0;
00204       TMR3H = 0;
00205       TMR3RLL = 0xFF;
00206       TMR3RLH = 0xFF;
00207 
00208       TMR3CN = (1 << 2);        /* clock/12, Timer 3 enabled */
00209 
00210       /* trigger NE555 */
00211       NE555_TRIGGER = 0;
00212       delay_us(1);
00213       NE555_TRIGGER = 1;
00214 
00215       /* wait until NE555 output goes low again */
00216       while ((P1 & m) != 0 && (TMR3CN & 0x80) == 0);
00217 
00218       if ((TMR3CN & 0x80) != 0) {
00219          /* overflow */
00220          c = 999;
00221 
00222          /* stop timer 3 */
00223          TMR3CN = 0;
00224 
00225          goto overflow;
00226       } else {
00227          /* stop timer 3 */
00228          TMR3CN = 0;
00229 
00230          /* time in us */
00231          v += TMR3H * 256 + TMR3L;
00232       }
00233    }
00234 
00235    c = (float) v / i / 11.052 * 12;
00236 
00237    /* time in s */
00238    c /= 1E6;
00239 
00240    /* convert to nF via t = 1.1 * R * C */
00241    c = c / 1.1 / 5.6E6 * 1E9;
00242 
00243    /* apply overall gain */
00244    c *= user_data.gain;
00245 
00246    /* general offset 18pF */
00247    c -= 0.018;
00248 
00249    /* channel offset */
00250    c -= user_data.ofs[channel] / 1000.0;
00251 
00252    /* stip off unsignificant digits */
00253    c = ((int) (c * 1000 + 0.5)) / 1000.0;
00254 
00255  overflow:
00256 
00257    DISABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00258    user_data.cap[channel] = c;
00259    ENABLE_INTERRUPTS;
00260 
00261    channel = (channel + 1) % 8;
00262 }
00263 
00264 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00265 
00266 void user_loop(void)
00267 {
00268    static long t = 0;
00269 
00270    if (time() - t > 10) {
00271       cap_read();
00272       t = time();
00273    }
00274 }
